sentences.cn: 许多人匆匆地赶去进餐.
你常常在外面进餐 吗 ?

sentences.en: Does she dine out everywhere as well as at my sister's?
sentences.cn: 她除了到我姐姐家赴宴外,也到其它各处赴宴 吗 ?

sentences.en: Does the Queen really dine off the gold plates?
sentences.cn: 女王真的用金盘子进餐 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was dining with friends at the Ritz.
sentences.cn: 他和朋友在里茨饭店一起进餐。

sentences.en: How long can she dine out on her former success?
sentences.cn: 她靠往日的成功而享名的日子能有多久 呢 ?

sentences.en: How pleasant it is to dine on fine well - cooked fish and fresh vegetables, in such charming surroundings!
sentences.cn: 在这个如此迷人的环境中,能吃上精心烹调的鱼和鲜嫩可口的蔬菜该有多美.

sentences.en: I was going off to dine when I saw you. "
sentences.cn: 我正要去吃午饭就看到了你.

sentences.en: I wish I could afford to dine off fresh meat every day.
sentences.cn: 我要是能天天吃到新鲜的肉就好了.

sentences.en: I've half a mind to dine first.'
sentences.cn: 我看,还是先吃了饭再说吧. ”

sentences.en: Let's dine out tonight. I'm too tired to cook.
sentences.cn: 我太累了,不想做饭, 今晚咱们到外面吃吧.

sentences.en: They drove back, and at 6.15 sat down to dine.
sentences.cn: 他们乘车往回赶, 6点1刻时才坐下来吃饭.

sentences.en: They used to enjoy going out to dine.
sentences.cn: 他们以前很喜欢出去吃饭。

sentences.en: We dance on the green, dine at the hermitage, and wander in the woods by moonlight.
sentences.cn: 我们在绿茵上跳舞, 在僻静的住所晚餐, 在月光下漫步于森林中.

sentences.en: We usually dine at a nice little restaurant in town when we have visitors.
sentences.cn: 有客人时,我们通常在城里一家舒适的小餐馆里就餐.

words.tran_cn: 用餐者；路边小饭店；餐车式简便餐厅

trans.tran_cn: (Dine)人名；(意、葡)迪内；(英)戴恩；(法)迪纳
